name: Wits & Luck
description:
Game About:
You are a lone Knight that has been punished and put in to the Eternal Dungeon,
your way out is guarded by 3 Guardians, get through them and Freedom is yours once again.

Theme:
The Theme is "Roll of the Dice", you can roll the dice to determine what action you will get to combat against the enemies.

Controls:
Arrow Keys for Movements
Mouse for Rolling Dice

DevNote:
This game is made for GMTK 2022, and it was exhausting, so If you liked this game be sure to check my Youtube Channel, I make Jam devlogs there!

Help me reach 100 subs this Year XD

Thanks for Playing!!!
